text: At 07.00, for those who are up already, I will have my Morning Reading Room, reading “Hierarchies of Solidarity” by Sinthujan Varatharajah and Moshtari Hilal!
Ob 8:00, 21. epizoda oddaje Mejenje avtorja Aljaža Škrlepa - tokrat o časovnem mejenju!

From 09.00 to 12.00 → “When Thinking is Doing” with Antônio and Tymon Hogenelst, “Topofonie”, “Medsvetovje” with the conversation between Radio Robida, Radio Onde Furlane and Radio Študent we hosted during Radio Gardening and “Branching In, Branching Out” with Castro Projects
At 16:00 → Ep. 2 Arhiviranje arhiva — Prepletanje in plastenje, a conversation with John Grzinich by Urška Savič
At 17:00 → Ep. 3 An Unfamiliar Ring — A Form of Memory by Giorgia Maurovich
At 18:00 → To Inhabit a Song. A Cover Show by Moritz Gansen
At 19:00 Ep. 5 Medsvetovje — Miha Obit by Aljaž Škrlep
And at 20:00 → Ep. 21 Branching In, Branching Out - Meg Miller, Laurel Schwulst - Ultralight School by Vida Rucli
At 18.00 Moritz LIVE with his cover show “To Inhabit a Song”
No, but I know the ambient mic gets a lot of the river :) but it’s been sunny in these days!
